articles.title: Ashes 2023: England announce XI for first Ashes Test at Edgbaston | ENG vs AUS - Wisden
articles.description: England have named their XI for the first Ashes Test, which begins at Edgbaston on Friday (June 16) - here's a look at how the team lines up.
articles.content:

articles.title: Albon praises 'huge job' done by Williams to get upgrades ready ahead of 'tricky' Canadian GP - Formula 1
